languages.text: {n}Воин смотрит на вас долгим проницательным взглядом.{/n} "Благодарность детей Азуриана твоему виду — редчайшая награда сама по себе, элантах. Но я уже какое-то время наблюдаю за твоими собратьями. Полагаю, в качестве доброй воли мне стоит вознаградить тебя за труды более... привычным мон-кай способом".

{n}Shairenkhei gives you a long and penetrating look.{/n} "The gratitude of the Children of Asuryan to your kind is a precious reward in itself, elantach. But I have been observing your kind for a while now. As a gesture of goodwill, I suppose I should reward your labours in a fashion more... customary among the mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: {n}Воин смотрит на вас долгим проницательным взглядом.{/n} "Благодарность детей Азуриана твоему виду — редчайшая награда сама по себе, элантах. Но я уже какое-то время наблюдаю за твоими собратьями. Полагаю, в качестве доброй воли мне стоит вознаградить тебя за труды более... привычным мон-кай способом".

But I have been watching your kin for a while now. As a gesture of goodwill, I suppose I should reward your labours in a way more... customary among the mon-keigh."

languages.text: {n}Shairenkhei te dirige una larga y penetrante mirada.{/n} «La gratitud de los hijos de Asuryan a tu especie constituye una valiosa recompensa en sí misma, elantach. Pero llevo un tiempo observando a los tuyos. Como gesto de buena voluntad, supongo que debería premiar tus esfuerzos de una manera más... tradicional para los mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: {n}Shairenkhei gives you a long and penetrating look.{/n} "The gratitude of the Children of Asuryan to your kind is a precious reward in itself, elantach. But I have been observing your kind for a while now. As a gesture of goodwill, I suppose I should reward your labours in a fashion more... customary among the mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Shairenkhei te dirige una larga y penetrante mirada.{/n} «La gratitud de los hijos de Asuryan a tu especie constituye una valiosa recompensa en sí misma, elantach. Pero llevo un tiempo observando a los tuyos. Como gesto de buena voluntad, supongo que debería premiar tus esfuerzos de una manera más... tradicional para los mon-keigh».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}榭伦凯以充满深意的目光看向你。{/n}“阿苏焉之子对你的感激之情本身就是珍贵的奖励，外界人。不过，我观察你的族群也有一段时间了。为了表示善意，我认为，我应该以更加……符合猴子习俗的方式，给予你一些奖励。”
languages.original_text: {n}Shairenkhei gives you a long and penetrating look.{/n} "The gratitude of the Children of Asuryan to your kind is a precious reward in itself, elantach. But I have been observing your kind for a while now. As a gesture of goodwill, I suppose I should reward your labours in a fashion more... customary among the mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}榭伦凯以充满深意的目光看向你。{/n}“阿苏焉之子对你的感激之情本身就是珍贵的奖励，外界人。不过，我观察你的族人也有一段时间了。为了表示善意，我认为，我应该以更加……符合猴子习俗的方式，给予你一些奖励。”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Shairenkhei vous lance un long regard pénétrant.{/n} « La gratitude des enfants d'Asuryan envers votre peuple est déjà une précieuse récompense en soi, elantach. Toutefois, cela fait un certain temps que j'observe les vôtres. En signe de bonne volonté, je devrais pouvoir vous remercier de votre aide d'une manière plus... coutumière chez les mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: {n}Shairenkhei gives you a long and penetrating look.{/n} "The gratitude of the Children of Asuryan to your kind is a precious reward in itself, elantach. But I have been observing your kind for a while now. As a gesture of goodwill, I suppose I should reward your labours in a fashion more... customary among the mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Shairenkhei vous lance un long regard pénétrant.{/n} « La gratitude des enfants d'Asuryan envers votre peuple est déjà une précieuse récompense en soi, elantach. Toutefois, cela fait un certain temps que j'observe les vôtres. En signe de bonne volonté, je devrais pouvoir vous remercier de votre aide d'une manière plus... coutumière chez les mon-keigh. »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}シャイレンケイは鋭いまなざしであなたをじっと見つめる{/n}「アシュリアンの御子らがお前に感謝すること自体が、貴重な報酬なのだ、エランタ。だが、私はお前の同族をずっと観察してきた。親善の印として、お前の労苦にもっと…モン＝ケイ的な方法で報いるべきだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Shairenkhei gives you a long and penetrating look.{/n} "The gratitude of the Children of Asuryan to your kind is a precious reward in itself, elantach. But I have been observing your kind for a while now. As a gesture of goodwill, I suppose I should reward your labours in a fashion more... customary among the mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}シャイレンケイは鋭いまなざしであなたをじっと見つめる{/n}「アシュリアンの御子らがお前に感謝すること自体が、貴重な報酬なのだ、エランタ。だが、私はお前の同族をずっと観察してきた。親善の印として、お前の労苦にもっと…モン＝ケイ的な方法で報いるべきだろう」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Shairenkhei blickt dich lang und durchdringend an.{/n} "Die Dankbarkeit der Kinder von Asuryan Eurer Spezies gegenüber ist allein schon eine wertvolle Belohnung, Elantach. Aber ich beobachte Eure Spezies seit geraumer Zeit. Als Geste des guten Willens sollte ich Eure Mühen wohl irgendwie belohnen ... wie das unter Chem-Pan-Sey üblich ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Shairenkhei gives you a long and penetrating look.{/n} "The gratitude of the Children of Asuryan to your kind is a precious reward in itself, elantach. But I have been observing your kind for a while now. As a gesture of goodwill, I suppose I should reward your labours in a fashion more... customary among the mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Shairenkhei blickt dich lang und durchdringend an.{/n} "Die Dankbarkeit der Kinder von Asuryan Eurer Spezies gegenüber ist allein schon eine wertvolle Belohnung, Elantach. Aber ich beobachte Eure Spezies seit geraumer Zeit. Als Geste des guten Willens sollte ich Eure Mühen wohl irgendwie belohnen ... wie das unter Chem-Pan-Sey üblich ist."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Shairenkhei sana uzun ve delici bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nın soydaşlarına karşı duyduğu minnettarlık, kendi başına kıymetli bir ödüldür elantach. Ancak bir süredir soydaşlarını gözlemliyorum. Sanırım iyi niyet göstergesi olarak emeklerini... Mon-keighler arasında daha geleneksel görülen bir şekilde ödüllendirmem gerek."
languages.original_text: {n}Shairenkhei gives you a long and penetrating look.{/n} "The gratitude of the Children of Asuryan to your kind is a precious reward in itself, elantach. But I have been observing your kind for a while now. As a gesture of goodwill, I suppose I should reward your labours in a fashion more... customary among the mon-keigh."

Ancak bir süredir soydaşlarını gözlemliyorum. Sanırım iyi niyet göstergesi olarak emeklerini... Mon-keighler arasında daha geleneksel görülen bir şekilde ödüllendirmem gerek."
